root.name: Pro Yakyuu Spirits 2010
root.description: ModesTutorialExhibitionOnlineStardom Mode - Create-a-player modeGrand Prix - Manager modePennant Race - Play either the Japan Series, an abbreviated season, or a full NPB season.TrainingPlayersAll players on an NPB roster, including recent drafts, minor league, and foreign-born players, are modeled and present in the game.TeamsCentral LeagueYomiuri GiantsTokyo Yakult SwallowsChunichi DragonsHiroshima Toyo CarpYokohama BayStarsHanshin TigersPacific LeagueHokkaido Nippon-Ham FightersFukuoka Softbank HawksSaitama Seibu LionsTohoku Rakuten Golden EaglesChiba Lotte MarinesOrix BuffaloesStadiumsAll regular team stadiums are featured in the game, along with miscellaneous local ballparks.Central LeagueTokyo Dome - Tokyo, Japan (Giants)Meiji Jingu Stadium - Tokyo, Japan (Swallows)Nagoya Dome - Nagoya, Japan (Dragons)Mazda Zoom-Zoom Stadium Hiroshima - Hiroshima, Japan (Carp)Yokohama Stadium - Yokohama, Japan (BayStars)Koshien Stadium - Nishinomiya, Japan (Tigers)Pacific LeagueSapporo Dome - Sapporo, Japan (Fighters)Fukuoka Yahoo! Japan Dome - Fukuoka, Japan (Hawks)Seibu Dome - Saitama, Japan (Lions)Kleenex Stadium Miyagi - Sendai, Japan (Golden Eagles)Chiba Marine Stadium - Chiba, Japan (Marines)Skymark Stadium - Kobe, Japan (Buffaloes)Kyocera Dome Osaka - Osaka, Japan (Buffaloes)
